paper_abstract: In this paper, some separation axioms such as the L-T-2, L-Urysohn, and L-completely Hausdorff axioms in Shi's sense are generalized from L-topologies to I-fuzzy topologies. Their properties are explored, and the relations among them and other separation axioms are discussed. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Some separation axioms in I-fuzzy topological spaces
